MemoryInfobox.description: 'Since Kassandra had agreed to play Hermes Trismegistus|god, she needed to fulfill the promise she made to the desperate worshipper.'

General_Description: '''Merciful Gods''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s [[Genetic memory|genetic memories]], relived by [[Layla Hassan]] in 2018 through the [[Animus|Portable Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra travelled to the woman's house to fulfil her promise.
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra travelled to the woman's house in [[Sami]]. She investigated the wrecked cart.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Just like she said. The cart looks pretty worse-for-wear.''
She investigated the basket on the floor.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Looks like these new baskets were off to market—until the cart broke.''
Kassandra placed some of the loot she recovered from [[Drogarati Cave]] cave in a basket.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''This should help. Better them than the [[bandit]]s.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra fulfilled her promise to the woman, storing several treasures in a basket in her home.
Section_Behind_the_scenes: This quest is triggered by choosing to reply to the woman's prayers to Hermes in "[[Hungry Gods]]".
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
